name: Gaming Workshop
shortDescription: Learn game design, streaming techniques, and more in our interactive workshops.

name: PUBG: BATTLEGROUNDS Weeks
shortDescription: Show off your creative side and compete in our exciting cosplay contest. Prizes for the best costumes!

name: Esports Tournament
shortDescription: Compete in thrilling esports battles against top teams and players for glory and cash prizes.

name: Gaming Convention Pass
shortDescription: Access all areas of our gaming convention, featuring game showcases, panels, and more!

name: VR Gaming Experience
shortDescription: Dive into virtual reality with our state-of-the-art VR gaming setups. The future of gaming is here!

name: Roobet Cup 2023Roobet Cup 2023
shortDescription: The Roobet Cup is a European CS:GO tournament all set to take place from 22nd to 30th June, featuring a total prize pool of $250,000 USD (INR 1,95,79,875) with 16 teams set to compete in this tier-two online tournament being organized by Relog Media.
